title: How big is 800 to 1200 square feet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question : How big is 800 to 1200 square feet ? Answer : Take a measuring tape and go to a field. A modern measuring tape has one side for FEET and the other side for METERS. For these measurements , use the side for FEET. Now: (1) Measure Length 40 feet and Width 20 feet to obtain 800 square feet , OR (2) Measure Length 80 feet and Width 10 feet to obtain 800 square feet. (3) Measure Length 60 feet and Width 20 feet to obtain 1200 square feet, OR (4) Measure Length 40 feet and Width 30 feet to obtain 1200 square feet. Let me know how well you are getting on. You can not miss getting it right using the above approach. Acknowledge reply with an up vote.

Given — 800 - 1200 square feet …. just imagine a 28 foot square to 35 foot square. A 800 square feet is about a square with 28 feet as a side while a 1200 square feet is about a square with 35 feet to a side.
